summary: This document is an email from Jes Staley discussing the potential relocation of himself and the headquarters of an unspecified entity to Singapore due to unfavorable political conditions. The email reflects concerns about the political climate and suggests a strategic move.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the sender of the email expressing concerns about political conditions and suggesting a move to Singapore.

keyFacts: Jes Staley sent an email on December 25, 2009.
The email discusses moving himself and the headquarters of an unspecified entity to Singapore.
Staley expresses concerns about the political climate being 'ugly'.
